content:
I'd like to ask if some special permission is required to review a mathlib PR with "approve" state? Usually I only review with "comment" state. In this page https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/pr-review.html it's said that in order to use maintainer XXX command, you need to be a mathlib reviewer. But it does not mention if the permission is required to give "approve" state.

BTW, Is it possible to apply for a mathlib reviewer?
No, anyone can approve a PR. I don't think anyone ever applied to become a reviewer, but I am sure the maintainers would be happy to see your interest in the role.
Maintainers welcome quality reviews and approvals from everyone!
